page.title: [Atom] 에디터 에러 : source.js.jsx of undefined
page.content: 에러메시지    Failed to activate the react package        Cannot read property 'source.js.jsx' of undefined    Hide Stack Trace        TypeError: Cannot read property 'source.js.jsx' of undefined    at AtomReact.autoSetGrammar (/Users/taeseongpark/.atom/packages/react/lib/atom-react.coffee:134:54)    at AtomReact.processEditor (/Users/taeseongpark/.atom/packages/react/lib/atom-react.coffee:322:6)    at Workspace.observeTextEditors (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app/src/workspace.js:728:15)    at AtomReact.activate (/Users/taeseongpark/.atom/packages/react/lib/atom-react.coffee:343:46)    at Package.activateNow (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app/src/package.js:230:33)    at measure (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app/src/package.js:206:33)    at Package.measure (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app/src/package.js:88:25)    at activationPromise.Promise (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app/src/package.js:200:20)    at Package.activate (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app/src/package.js:198:38)    at PackageManager.activatePackage (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app/src/package-manager.js:695:42)    at config.transactAsync (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app/src/package-manager.js:670:36)    at Config.module.exports.Config.transactAsync (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app/src/config.js:367:24)    at PackageManager.activatePackages (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app/src/package-manager.js:668:23)    at PackageManager.activate (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app/src/package-manager.js:647:50)    at loadStatePromise.loadState.then (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app/src/atom-environment.js:841:27)        The error was thrown from the react package. This issue has already been reported.        이슈보드    https://github.com/orktes/atom-react/issues/269        해결    React 0.17.0 을 0.18.0 으로 업뎃 후 에러 안나옴
page.html:
에러메시지

Failed to activate the react package


Cannot read property 'source.js.jsx' of undefined

Hide Stack Trace


TypeError: Cannot read property 'source.js.jsx' of undefined

at AtomReact.autoSetGrammar (/Users/taeseongpark/.atom/packages/react/lib/atom-react.coffee:134:54)

at AtomReact.processEditor (/Users/taeseongpark/.atom/packages/react/lib/atom-react.coffee:322:6)

at Workspace.observeTextEditors (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app/src/workspace.js:728:15)

at AtomReact.activate (/Users/taeseongpark/.atom/packages/react/lib/atom-react.coffee:343:46)

at Package.activateNow (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app/src/package.js:230:33)

at measure (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app/src/package.js:206:33)

at Package.measure (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app/src/package.js:88:25)

at activationPromise.Promise (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app/src/package.js:200:20)

at Package.activate (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app/src/package.js:198:38)

at PackageManager.activatePackage (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app/src/package-manager.js:695:42)

at config.transactAsync (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app/src/package-manager.js:670:36)

at Config.module.exports.Config.transactAsync (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app/src/config.js:367:24)

at PackageManager.activatePackages (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app/src/package-manager.js:668:23)

at PackageManager.activate (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app/src/package-manager.js:647:50)

at loadStatePromise.loadState.then (/Applications/Atom.app/Contents/Resources/app/src/atom-environment.js:841:27)


The error was thrown from the react package. This issue has already been reported.


이슈보드

https://github.com/orktes/atom-react/issues/269


해결

React 0.17.0 을 0.18.0 으로 업뎃 후 에러 안나옴
